name: N.O.A.H.
description:
N.O.A.H.

Near Orbit Animal Harvester

You are a Grey Alien. Your world is dying. In a last ditch attempt to save it you have been tasked with visiting other worlds and taking their animals.

Capture animals from the ground and take them to the top of the screen to beam them to the mothership.

Use the cursor keys or WASD to move.

Use [SPACE] to fire.
